channel.title: Erion Village
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Erion Village" - The Village Hidden in Cebu

item.title: Re: Erion Village
item.content:encoded: Yes, I have now became the Kage of Erion.

item.title: Re: Erion Village
item.content:encoded: Are you kage? Cause i didnt see Youga Neji as current kage.

item.title: Re: Erion Village
item.content:encoded: *Update*. Thanks to all the newcomers. We currently have 31 Members now, and a lot of new upgrades. We are still recruiting so feel free to join us

item.title: Re: Erion Village
item.content:encoded: Yo Ddue what happened to allying with me? Member me? The leader of Nendo and The Uchiha? You said you would join my alliance.

item.title: Erion Village
item.content:encoded:
Hi, I'm SerkJeh. I've just been given the title Vice Kage of our village by our village leader Youga Neji.

We are an active village and we are recruiting new members, all levels and experience are welcome to join. Whether you are new or a seasoned player we will strive to help you and provide you with as much help as possible.

Right now, we currently have 13 members and a top of 22. We also have several upgrades that will help newcomers to a great extent. We are also a part of the ninja war, not to mention that our village has already formed an alliance with several villages.

I'm also an active Vice Kage of the village, so you will most likely see me on. Any help or questions that you may have can be addressed to me, or to our village leader Youga Neji who is also very active.

So, Join us and with your help we will achieve greatness!
